attributes.additional_details:
The broadcasting media has changed considerably in recent years, leaving the BBC with a broadcasting dominance. Because of the strength of the domination in the number of TV channels, local TV & radio and also the very powerful website the BBC has considerable and unaccountable power to influence news and views.
Its time for the BBC to return to Public Service Broadcasting with its commercial activities separated and moved into a free competative market not subsidised by licence income.
